questions.question_text: “jene niṣhkāmī vartamān draḍh hoy to te thakī ame hajār gāu ________ jaīe to paṇ tenī pāse ja chhīe; ane jene te niṣhkāmī vartamānmā kāchyap chhe ne te jo amārī pāse rahe chhe toy paṇ te lākh gāu chheṭe chhe.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.Ma.33,  “jene niṣhkāmī vartamān draḍh hoy to te thakī ame hajār gāu chheṭe jaīe to paṇ tenī pāse ja chhīe; ane jene te niṣhkāmī vartamānmā kāchyap chhe ne te jo amārī pāse rahe chhe toy paṇ te lākh gāu chheṭe chhe.

questions.question_text: Amane keva bhakta hoy tenā ja hāthnī karī sevā game chhe?
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.Ma.33, amane niṣhkāmī bhakta hoy tenā ja hāthnī karī sevā game chhe.

questions.question_text: Aksharnā vāsī vahālo, āvyā avani par, Navkhanḍ dhartīmā Swāmī, ________ chāle rāj...
questions.explanation: From the kirtan, Aksharnā vāsī vahālo, āvyā avani par, Navkhanḍ dhartīmā Swāmī, chhatrāyā chāle rāj...

questions.question_text: Avani par āvī vahāle satsang sthāpyo, Harijanone kol, ________ āpyo rāj...
questions.explanation: From the kirtan, Avani par āvī vahāle satsang sthāpyo, Harijanone kol, kalyāṇno āpyo rāj...

questions.question_text: Pānche vartmān pāḷe, bāīo ne bhāīo, Harijan sangāthe kīdhī, ________ rāj... Akshar 2
questions.explanation: From the kirtan, Pānche vartmān pāḷe, bāīo ne bhāīo, Harijan sangāthe kīdhī, sāchī sagāīo rāj... Akshar 2

questions.question_text: Bāīo dekhīne bhāīo, chheṭerā chāle, Paḍī vastu koīnī, ________ rāj... Akshar 3
questions.explanation: From the kirtan, Bāīo dekhīne bhāīo, chheṭerā chāle, Paḍī vastu koīnī, hāthe nav jhāle rāj... Akshar 3

questions.question_text: Devnā dev vahālo, dhāmnā Dhāmī, Pragaṭ Prabhunu nām, ________ rāj... Akshar 4
questions.explanation: From the kirtan, Devnā dev vahālo, dhāmnā Dhāmī, Pragaṭ Prabhunu nām, Sahajānand Swāmī rāj... Akshar 4

questions.question_text: Premānandnā Swāmī ānandkārī, Potānā jannī vā’le, ________ rāj... Akshar 5
questions.explanation: From the kirtan, Premānandnā Swāmī ānandkārī, Potānā jannī vā’le, lāj vadhārī rāj... Akshar 5

questions.question_text: According to Vach.Ga.Ma.33, if someone has a firm understanding of Nishkami Vartman, how far away can we be from them and still be close?
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.Ma.33, jene niṣhkāmī vartamān draḍh hoy to te thakī ame hajār gāu chheṭe jaīe to paṇ tenī pāse ja chhīe

questions.question_text: According to Vach.Ga.Ma.33, if someone has faults in Nishkami Vartman and stays close to us, how far away are they?
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.Ma.33, jene te niṣhkāmī vartamānmā kāchyap chhe ne te jo amārī pāse rahe chhe toy paṇ te lākh gāu chheṭe chhe.
